tool_description: Get the Last Games(Matches) from Football Soccer
name: Football Soccer Team Score API
title: Football Soccer Team Score API

api_list.name: Get the Last Games(Matches) from Football Soccer from a team chosen by you
api_list.description: This endpoint will return the last games(matches) from a team chosen by you, from this championships: FIFA World Cup, UEFA Champions League, Bundesliga, Eredivisie, Campeonato Brasileiro Série A, Primera Division, Ligue 1, ELC Championship, Primeira Liga, European Championship, Serie A, Premier League, Copa Libertadores.

api_list.name: Get the Last Games(Matches) from Football Soccer
api_list.description: This endpoint will return the last games(matches) from the last 12 months from this championships: FIFA World Cup, UEFA Champions League, Bundesliga, Eredivisie, Campeonato Brasileiro Série A, Primera Division, Ligue 1, ELC Championship, Primeira Liga, European Championship, Serie A, Premier League, Copa Libertadores.

api_list.name: Get the Last Games(Matches) from Football Soccer with a season chosen by you
api_list.description: This endpoint will return the last games(matches) with a season chosen by you, from this championships: FIFA World Cup, UEFA Champions League, Bundesliga, Eredivisie, Campeonato Brasileiro Série A, Primera Division, Ligue 1, ELC Championship, Primeira Liga, European Championship, Serie A, Premier League, Copa Libertadores.

api_list.name: Get the match from Football Soccer with the id chosen by you
api_list.description: This endpoint will return the game with the id chosen by you, from this championships: FIFA World Cup, UEFA Champions League, Bundesliga, Eredivisie, Campeonato Brasileiro Série A, Primera Division, Ligue 1, ELC Championship, Primeira Liga, European Championship, Serie A, Premier League, Copa Libertadores.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://football-soccer-team-score-api.p.rapidapi.com/matches/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football-soccer-team-score-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://football-soccer-team-score-api.p.rapidapi.com/matches/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football-soccer-team-score-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get the Last Games(Matches) from Football Soccer with a league chosen by you
api_list.description: This endpoint will return the last games(matches) with a league chosen by you, from this championships: FIFA World Cup, UEFA Champions League, Bundesliga, Eredivisie, Campeonato Brasileiro Série A, Primera Division, Ligue 1, ELC Championship, Primeira Liga, European Championship, Serie A, Premier League, Copa Libertadores.

api_list.name: Get the Last Games(Matches) from Football Soccer with a date chosen by you
api_list.description: This endpoint will return the last games(matches) with a date chosen by you, from this championships: FIFA World Cup, UEFA Champions League, Bundesliga, Eredivisie, Campeonato Brasileiro Série A, Primera Division, Ligue 1, ELC Championship, Primeira Liga, European Championship, Serie A, Premier League, Copa Libertadores.
